source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_00<tab>Seww has a culinary favor to ask of you.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_00<tab>Seww benötigt Nahrung für den Nachwuchs.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_01<tab>Though Seww and his spawnbrothers can subsist on a diet of fish, he longs for the days when they could feast on amphibian flesh. Search the Sapsa Spawning Grounds for the Tridents' private herd of axolotls, and slay one for its tail meat.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_01<tab>Die leeren Mägen der jungen Sahagin-Brut müssen gefüllt werden. Bringe Seww dafür <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8981020502 /var>. Dafür musst du zuerst <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 02F20727020502 /var> am Sapsa-Laichplatz erlegen und dir <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8978020502 /var> besorgen.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_02<tab>Now that you have obtained the rubbery flesh of an axolotl, you can follow the remainder of Seww's instructions. Find a cooking trough in which to stew the tail meat, and defend yourself from Trident warriors who wander in to partake of the boiling fish broth.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_02Du hast ergattert. Untersuche nun einen der , die im Inneren des Sapsa-Laichplatzes stehen, um zu machen.
Setze dich zur Wehr, falls du dabei von , oder überfallen wirst.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_03<tab>You have fended off the attacks of several ravenous Sahagin soldiers. Stew the axolotl meat in the cooking trough, and then retrieve it before the flesh dissolves into the boiling broth.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_03<tab>Du hast die Riff-Harpunen, die dich angegriffen haben, abgewehrt. Koche nun <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8978020502 /var> in einem der <var 32 ((EObj)) 06F61E9398030302 /var>, die im Inneren des Sapsa-Laichplatzes stehen, um <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8981020502 /var> zu machen.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_04<tab>You have successfully retrieved the slab of now-tender tail meat. Return to Novv's Nursery and deliver the steaming flesh to Seww.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_04<tab>Bring <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8981020502 /var> zu Seww in Novvs Zuflucht.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_05<tab>You deliver the tender tail meat to an appreciative Seww. The spawnling's unusually effusive compliments suggest that any future contributions of axolotl flesh will be accepted with equal enthusiasm.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEQ_05<tab>Du hast Seww <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8981020502 /var> gebracht. Er ist ganz gerührt von deiner Fürsorge für die Sahagin-Brut. Es wird nicht lange dauern, bis die Kleinen wieder Hunger verspüren.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_TODO_00<tab>Obtain a slab of rubbery tail meat from an axolotl.
TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_TODO_01<tab>Find and secure a broth trough.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_TODO_01<tab><var 2B ((<var 32 ((EObj)) 02F61E9398020502 /var>)) /var> untersuchen und die Riff-Harpunen besiegen

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_TODO_02<tab>Let the axolotl tail stew in the broth trough before retrieving the tender tail meat.
TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the tender tail meat to Seww.

TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_000<tab>Pshhh... I have a favor to ask of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. While my shhhpawnbrothers and I can shhhurvive on fishhh alone, it would do much for our shhhpirits to fill our bellies with a different kind of flesh.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_000<tab>Ssssh ... Unsere junge Brut benötigt Nahrung. Und <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8978030502 /var> <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20727030302 /var> verspeisen sie besondersss gerne.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_001<tab>It has been an age shhhince we have feashhhted on axolotl─we used to hunt the creatures often, but then the Tridentshhh herded them all into the shhhpawning grounds.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_001<tab>Die Kleinen sehnen sich nach einem ordentlichen Happen Knorpelfleisch ... Aber die schmackhaftesten <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F20727030502 /var> findet man im Revier der Riff-Harpunen.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_002<tab>If you were to venture into Trident territory and bring back a shhhucculent tail, you would do much to endear yourshhhelf to my people.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_002<tab>Psssh ... Geh zum Sassspa-Laichplatz und schneide <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 02F20727020402 /var> sein Schwanzende ab.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_003<tab>And if you truly wishhh to bring ushhh a treat, then shhhtew the fleshhh in the boiling fishhh broth of the Shhhapsa warriors until it becomes juicy and tender.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_003<tab>Aber ... sssh ... die junge Brut kann kein zähesss Knorpelfleisch essen, es muss zuerst weich gemacht werden. Koche deine Beute deswegen in einem der <var 32 ((EObj)) 06F61E9398030302 /var>, die im Inneren des Sapsa-Laichplatzes stehen, mache ssso <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8981020502 /var> und bring es mir.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_004<tab>Pshhh... You may be accoshhhted by hungry Tridentshhh while you wait for the meat to shhhoften. Like moshhht shhholdiers, they take any threat to their food shhhupply very shhheriously.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_004<tab>Die Riff-Harpunen lassen ihre Bottiche natürlich nicht unbewacht herumssstehen. Setz dich zur Wehr, wenn du angegriffen wirst. Wir lassen uns von denen nichtsss gefallen! Psssh ...

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_005<tab>The clutch would be moshhht grateful if you could head into the shhhpawning grounds and hunt down an axolotl.
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_005<tab>Sssh ... Geh zum Sassspa-Laichplatz und nimm <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 02F20727020402 /var> sein Schwanzende ab.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_006<tab>Pshhh... The clutch would be even <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> grateful if you could shhhtew the meat in one of the Shhhapsa broth troughs before you return. Just beware of Trident warriors coming in to feed...
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_006<tab>Koche deine Beute dann in einem der <var 32 ((EObj)) 06F61E9398030302 /var>, die im Inneren des Sapsa-Laichplatzes stehen, mache ssso <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8981020502 /var> und bring es mir.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_POP_MESSAGE_000_000<tab>Your cooking efforts are interrupted by hungry Sahagin warriors!
TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>The rubbery axolotl tail slowly softens in the boiling broth...
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Du kochst <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8978020502 /var> in <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9398020402 /var>, bis es weich wird.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_010<tab>Have you returned to reshhhcue ushhh from our unending diet of fishhh?
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_010<tab>Die junge Sahagin-Brut braucht <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8981030502 /var>, um groß, stark und glitschig zu werden.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_011<tab>Pshhh! That wonderful shhhmell! You shhhtewed the meat! Thishhh may be your greateshhht contribution to the clutch yet!
target: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_SEWW_000_011<tab>Sssh! Das sssieht ja kössstlich aus! Das möchte ich mir selbssst gerne zwischen die Kiemen hauen. Aber es ist ja für die Brut ... Hab vielen Dank, <var 08 E905 ((Abenteurerin)) ((Abenteurer)) /var>.

source: TEXT_BANSAH306_01405_BALLOON_000_020<tab>Pshhh! Shhhtep away from the trough, shhhorewalker!
